body: A brother and sister died yesterday in the bedroom of their Brooklyn apartment of smoke inhalation from a fire that the Fire Department said had been caused by careless cooking. Firefighters who responded to the alarm found the children's mother, Evelyn Green, in the street, screaming, ''My children are in there!'' Firefighters raced up by ladder
title: THE CITY; 2 Children Die In Brooklyn Fire

body: Over cheesecake at Junior's, a Brooklyn restaurant, Daniel Greenbaum and Allen Handelman sealed their real estate partnership in January 1981. They agreed to seek out Brooklyn properties for rehabilitation and resale as cooperatives. title: ABOUT REAL ESTATE; BROOKLYN REHABILITATION ENTERPRENEURS

body: THIS is a tough year to look for an apartment or a house in New YorkC ity, but it is also a year of opportunity.
